cause.description:
I have been endorsed by the Greens for the Federal seat of Grayndler (Sydney). My cause is to build an army of friends, supporters and VOTERS to get myself elected.
As a Marrickville resident of 18 years and as a councillor over the past 3 years, I have come to know the real concerns and frustrations of the people of Grayndler.
A part of the frustration is related to over a decade of Howard rule. The other part has a lot do with lack of representation and voice.
Grayndler has always been a safe Labor seat and this has resulted in a factional empire that prefers numbers over clear vision for the area.
The people of Grayndler deserve a fresh vision, action and results.
www.saaedkhan.org
1. we must protect the rights of working Australains
2. we must take action now to stop climate change
3. we must build a fair and inclusive society
cause.mission:
Assist me to become the next Federal Member for Grayndler at 2007 Elections. why?
According to the Australian Unity Wellbeing Index, Grayndler is the most unhappiest electorate in Australia.
cause.name: Khan for Grayndler
